articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Construction Project for Building C1 Chemical Industry
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Construction Project for Building C1 Chemical Industry
 Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, made a field survey of construction project for building the CI chemical industry.
					 Going round the various parts of the construction site, he gave pep-talks to the builders.
					
					 A consultative meeting was convened there. The meeting discussed the measures to finish the project in a qualitative way at an early date true to the Party's intention to put the chemical industry on a Juche basis.
					
					 Earlier, the premier visited the Sunchon Phosphate Fertilizer Plant under construction and the maize and dry-field crop research centers of the Institute of Agricultural Science under renovation and stressed the need to raise the construction speed and supply in time the building materials.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand on Reform of UNSC Clarified
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand on Reform of UNSC Clarified
 Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The permanent representative of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to the United Nations made a speech at the plenary meeting of the General Assembly 72nd Session under the agenda item "Question of Equitable Representation on and Increase in the Membership of the Security Council and Other Matters related to the Security Council".
					 He said:
					
					 At the present, the issue of reforming the UNSC presents itself as an important and pressing matter in respect of the present complicated international situation and the building of a peaceful and stable world.
					
					 Right now, the fundamental principles of international relations on equality of sovereignty and mutual respect stipulated in the UN Charter are being wantonly violated and sovereign states are being openly subjected to interference, military invasion and massacre in the international arena. 
					
					 These situations which seriously affect world peace and security are caused by the U.S. who is abusing its privileged position as a "permanent member state of the UNSC" as a political means for implementing its strategy of world dominance.
					
					 Saying that the UNSC should be fully reformed in accordance with the requirements of the changing times, he clarified the following DPRK's principled stand:
					
					 First, the reform of the UNSC should be thoroughly directed towards ensuring impartiality, objectivity and democracy.
					
					 The reform of the UNSC should be undertaken in a way to reject the arrogance, arbitrariness, high-handedness and double-standard of particular countries which place themselves above the UN Charter and international law and ensure compliance with the principles of equality of sovereignty and mutual respect.
					
					 Second, the UNSC should be reformed on the principle of ensuring full representation of the non-aligned and developing countries.
					
					 As we can see from the results of the inter-governmental negotiation on the reform of the UNSC, although 10 years have passed since the issue of expanding the UNSC was first discussed, it still has an uncertain prospect because of conflicting viewpoints.
					
					 Under these circumstances, the way to reconstruct the imbalance of the UNSC is to give precedence to the expansion of the non-permanent member states to the UNSC.
					
					 Third, Japan's moves to become a permanent member state of the UNSC should never be tolerated.
					
					 Japan is the chief war criminal state which invaded many Asian countries by military force and committed heinous crimes against humanity that go beyond the human imagination, in particular the crime of sex slavery.
					
					 The fact that Japan, the chief war criminal state which is denying such inhumane crimes and seeking the resurgence of militarism, attempts to become a permanent member state of the sacred UNSC, itself is nonsense and an open affront to the international society.
					
					 Concluding his speech the DPRK representative expressed the hope that the efforts of the international society for the reform of the UNSC would bear successful fruits.

articles.title: Music and Dance Performance Given in Anju City
articles.content:
Music and Dance Performance Given in Anju City
 Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe gave a joint music and dance performance in Anju City, South Phyongan Province from Nov. 2 to 12.
					 The Anju Theatre, a venue of the performance, had been crowded with working people of various circles and youth and students from different parts of the province every day.
					
					 The numbers of the performance, which begins with the Patriotic Song (national anthem), included male solo and chorus "Song Dedicated to Mother Party" and light music and series of songs "Oh Party, It's Thanks to Your Care".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the greatness of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The audience warmly congratulated the artistes on their successful performance, giving loud applause and presenting bouquets.
					
					 The performance deeply impressed the audience.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK War Exercises Flayed
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK War Exercises Flayed
 Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean warmongers staged a combined sea intercepting drill with U.S. and the Australian naval forces in waters off Jeju Islands under the pretext of the "interdiction of WMD proliferation". Meanwhile, the puppet marine corps together with the U.S. marines launched a joint drill for guiding the air firepower in the areas around Paekryong and Yonphyong Islands.
					 Branding the puppet forces' involvement in the sea intercepting drill as an unpardonable military conspiracy to do harm to the fellow countrymen with the backing of outsiders while taking the advantages of their master's scheme for building NATO of Asian version, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary:
					
					 The joint marine drill around Paekryong and Yonphyong Islands aimed at a preemptive strike at major targets of the DPRK was a deliberate and planned military provocation to further strain the situation of acute confrontation.
					
					 The situation of the Korean peninsula is now on the worst phase of tension in which a nuclear war may break out any moment due to the U.S. reckless moves for aggression on the DPRK. So, it is clear what catastrophic phase such war games will bring.
					
					 The puppet warmongers, keen on the moves to provoke a war, escalating the tension in collusion with outsiders, are harassers of peace and traitors to the nation who can never be allowed to go scot-free.
					
					 The military provocation act of the puppet forces going helter-skelter with the backing of their master is a suicidal act of digging their own graves.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Regime's "Independent Sanctions Proposal"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Regime's "Independent Sanctions Proposal"
 Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The puppet regime of south Korea announced a "proposal for independent sanctions on the north" just a day before Trump's visit to it.
					 The "proposal" included some of the DPRK members, whom the U.S. listed as "targets of sanctions" in September, in the additional list of "sanctions".
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson Sunday dismisses it as a senseless act of sycophantic traitors serving the U.S. and a despicable burlesque of traitors to the nation to curry favor with the U.S. master.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities' deeds go to prove that their intention to stifle the fellow countrymen with the help of the U.S. and realize at any cost their design for "unification through absorption" can never change, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 No matter how loudly the puppet regime may vociferate about sort of "contribution" and "effect" of the "independent sanctions proposal", that will only disclose the poor situation of the colonial stooges whose lifeline is in the dark hands of the U.S. master.
					
					 The facts clearly show that the present south Korean authorities are the same pro-American traitors as the Park Geun Hye group which committed all sorts of crimes while serving the U.S., sworn enemy of the Korean nation, with all dedication, clean indifferent to the desire and wish of the whole nation.
					
					 The puppet forces committing unpardonable crimes against the nation one after another, obsessed by sycophancy and confrontation, while going against the mindset of the candlelight demonstrators, will be made to pay a dear price.

articles.title: S. Korean Expedition Stages Anti-Trump, Anti-U.S. Demo in UK
articles.content:
S. Korean Expedition Stages Anti-Trump, Anti-U.S. Demo in UK
 Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- An expedition of south Koreans staged an anti-Trump, anti-U.S. demonstration in Manchester City of Britain on Nov. 9, according to the south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo.
					 The expedition condemned Trump's visit to south Korea and war moves.
					
					 Many citizens expressed support for the demonstration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in DR Congo
Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted on its website the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Women Are a Dynamic Force Pushing Ahead with the Revolution and Construction" on November 6.
					The work, published on Mar. 8, Juche 84 (1995), says that the Korean women have intense loyalty to the Party and play an important role in the revolution and construction and the Korean women's movement has followed the proud road of victory under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Break Korean People's Will: Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Break Korean People's Will: Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. can never break the will of the Korean people.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on November 4.
					
					 Noting that shortly ago, the defense chiefs of the U.S. and south Korea discussed a matter of intensifying joint military drills at the annual security consultative meeting and the chairmen of their joint chiefs of staff were closeted over the military operation plans against the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 The U.S. seeks to use the south Korean puppet forces as the cannon-fodder in a war of aggression on the DPRK, and the puppet forces attempt to realize their ambition for invasion of the north with the help of their master.
					
					 However, those war maniacs should clearly understand that they can never invade the DPRK.
					
					 Socialist Korea is a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and ICBM possessor.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre campo de construccion de objetivos para fundar industria quimica de C1
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre campo de construccion de objetivos para fundar industria quimica de C1
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y premier del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, hizo conocimiento en el terreno del estado de la construccion de los objetivos para la fundacion de la industria quimica de C1.
					Estando en varios puntos del destino, el premier estimulo a los constructores.
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno se abordaron los problemas de medida para terminar cualitativamente en un corto tiempo la obra en respuesta al proposito del partido de realizar la jucheanizacion de la industria quimica.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier recorrio el campo de construccion de la Fabrica de Abono Fosforico de Sunchon y de remodelacion del Instituto de Maiz del Instituto de Agricultura y el Instituto de Cultivo de Secano, donde subrayo la necesidad de elevar la velocidad de construccion y exigio a las unidades relacionadas suministrar a tiempo los materiales necesarios.

articles.title: Representante coreano aclara posicion de principio de RPDC sobre reforma de CS de ONU
articles.content:
Representante coreano aclara posicion de principio de RPDC sobre reforma de CS de ONU
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El representante permanente coreano ante la ONU pronuncio un discurso en el debate de la agenda "Igual derecho a la representacion en la composicion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, la ampliacion de los paises miembros y otros problemas referentes al CS de la ONU" en el pleno de la 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					En la actualidad, la reforma del CS de la ONU se presenta como problema importante y urgente tanto en vista de la tendencia de la actual situacion internacional complicada como a la luz de la construccion del mundo pacifico y estable, asi senalo el representante coreano y continuo:
					
					En la arena internacional se violan flagrantemente los principios principales de relaciones internacionales, estipulados por la Carta de la ONU, cuyo fundamento es la igualdad de la soberania y el respeto mutuo, y se perpetran abiertamente la intervencion y la invasion armada contra los paises soberanos y la matanza.
					
					Todos los hechos negativos a la paz y la seguridad del mundo son originados por EE.UU. que bajo la gorra del "pais miembro permanente del CS de la ONU", abusa de su posicion privilegiada como aparato politico de la estrategia de dominar al mundo entero.
					
					El CS de la ONU debe ser reformado totalmente conforme a la demanda de la epoca cambiada y la realidad en desarrollo, asi insistio el representante coreano y expuso la siguiente posicion de principios de la RPDC:
					
					Primero, la reforma del CS de la ONU debe ser realizada materializando la imparcialidad, objetividad y la democracia.
					
					O sea, deben alterar el CS de la ONU para que se rechacen la arrogancia, el despotismo, la coaccion, la arbitrariedad y la pauta de doble rasero de un pais especifico que no hace caso de la Carta de la ONU y de las leyes internacionales, y para que se observen perfectamente el principio de igualdad de soberania y el respeto mutuo.
					
					Segundo, el CS de la ONU debe ser transformado bajo el principio de asegurar satisfactoriamente el derecho a representacion de los Paises No Alineados y los paises en vias de desarrollo.
					
					En cuanto a las anteriores negociaciones intergubernamentales sobre la reforma del CS, el problema de la ampliacion de los paises permanentes tiene el futuro lejano de su realizacion por no eliminar la divergencia en las opiniones aunque paso 10 anos desde el inicio del debate.
					
					En tal situacion, el remedio inmediato para corregir la composicion desequilibrada del CS de la ONU es anticipar la ampliacion de los paises miembros no permanentes.
					
					Tercero, nunca se puede perdonar el avance de Japon al pais permanente del CS de la ONU.
					
					El pais isla es un Estado criminal de categoria especial que en el pasado agredio a muchos paises asiaticos y cometio los inauditos crimenes antieticos, sobre todo, los crimenes de esclavitud sexual.
					
					El pais, que niega sus crimenes pasados e intenta revitalizar el militarismo, se esfuerza por hacerse el pais permanente del CS de la ONU, lo que es una cosa ilogica y un desafio a la sociedad internacional.
					
					El representante coreano expreso la esperanza de que den buenos frutos los esfuerzos de la sociedad internacional por la reforma del CS de la ONU.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras militares de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras militares de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los belicistas surcoreanos libraron junto con las fuerzas navales de EE.UU. y Australia en las aguas perifericas de la isla Jeju los ejercicios combinados para bloquear la zona maritima bajo la cobertura de la "interceptacion de proliferacion de armas de exterminio masivo". Por otra parte, las infanterias de marina del ejercicio titere surcoreano y de las tropas norteamericanas perpetraron en la region de las islas Paekryong y Yonphyong el entrenamiento combinado por la induccion de fuego aereo.
					Las aventuras de los titeres surcoreanos devienen el complot militar imperdonable para eliminar a los connacionales sumandose a las maniobras de su amo gringo encaminadas a formar la OTAN de version asiatica.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 12 y continua:
					
					Las maniobras de las infanterias de marina de los belicistas surcoreanos y EE.UU., cuyo objetivo es el ataque preventivo contra los importantes establecimientos de la RPDC, devienen una provocacion militar, intencional y planificada, que exacerba mas la situacion de la linea de confrontacion aguda.
					
					La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana ya esta muy delicada debido a las imprudentes maniobras de guerra de agresion a la RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					En este momento tan peligroso, los belicistas surcoreanos y norteamericanos desarrollaron los ejercicios militares simulando la agresion a la RPDC, sin tomar en cuenta sus resultados catastroficos.
					
					Los belicistas surcoreanos, que agravan la tension sumandose a la maquinacion de las fuerzas foraneas de provocar la guerra, son precisamente los traidores y perturbadores de la paz.
					
					La imprudencia militar de los titeres surcoreanos les llevara a su autodestruccion.

articles.title: Minju Joson burla "proyecto de sancion independiente anti-Norte de Corea"
articles.content:
Minju Joson burla "proyecto de sancion independiente anti-Norte de Corea"
Pyongyang, 12 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Un dia antes de la gira de Trump por el Sur de Corea, las autoridades surcoreanas publicaron el llamado "proyecto de sancion independiente anti-Norte de Corea", cuya medula es alistamiento adicional en su "lista de blancos de sancion" de algunos de los norcoreanos, quienes estan definidos como "blancos de sancion" en septiembre pasado por EE.UU.
					Esto es un acto de sirvientes pronorteamericanos sin precedentes y una farsa pueril de los traidores para lisonjear a su amo gringo.
					
					Asi burla el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado hoy y prosigue:
					
					La locura de las autoridades surcoreanas demuestra que no se cambia ni un comino la intencion de los titeres surcoreanos de aplastar a toda costa a los connacionales con la ayuda de EE.UU. y realizar su ambicion de la unificacion mediante la absorbicion.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos hablan ruidosamente de un "aporte" y "efecto" de ese "proyecto", pero, el elogio de si mismo muestra solo la situacion pobre de los lacayos coloniales cuyo destino depende de su amo norteamericano.
					
					Los hechos comprueban fehacientemente que las vigentes autoridades surcoreanas son el grupo de traidores proyanquis iguales a la banda de Park Geun-hye que cometio los crimenes de toda indole, navegando a contrapelo de la voluntad y la demanda de toda la nacion y depositando su destino en EE.UU., enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana.
					
					Pagaran muy caro los titeres surcoreanos que amontonan las delincuencias imperdonables al enloquecerse en servilismo a EE.UU. y la confrontacion fratricida.
